title: Star Wars: KotOR PC.iso + no-CD crack
description:
//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\
		   Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic PC
\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//

                                 INSTALLATION:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.) Using a program such as Alcohol 120 or Daemon Tools, mount or burn the file "Star Wars KotOR 1-4.iso".
	
NOTE: When the installation asks for CD 2, do not mount "Star Wars KotOR 2-4.iso" on another virtual drive, simply mount it over "Star Wars KotOR 1-4.iso".Do the same for CD 3 and CD 4 using "Star Wars KotOR 3-4.iso" and "Star Wars KotOR 4-4.iso"
	
2.) After the game is installed, the game will ask for you to insert the Play Disk. Just mount "Star Wars KotOR 2-4.iso"

//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\

						Patch / Crack
\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//\//
	
1.) To apply the crack just open the "swkotor.exe" to your SWKotOR root directory (C:Program FilesLucasArtsSWKotOR)
	
2.) When it asks if you want to replace the existing file press yes. [Vista users may need to run as admin]

3.) DONE!!! ENJOY!!!
